name: Heimweh
text: Gib dies dem Spieler von Piotr Rasputin. Du darfst deine Identität auf deine Alter-Ego-Seite umdrehen. Wähle eines: • Erschöpfe Piotr Rasputin → entferne Heimweh aus dem Spiel. • Lege diese Karte und jede Zäh-Statuskarte von deiner Identität ab. Falls du auf diese Weise keine Zäh-Statuskarten abgelegt hast, erhält diese Karte Nachrüsten.

flavor: "Nichts kann den Juggernaut aufhalten!"
name: Juggernaut
text:
Gestählt. Zähigkeit. (Colossus Erzfeind-Scherge.)
[star] Boost: Falls diese Aktivierung ein Angriff ist, erhält der Angriff Overkill und Durchdringend

flavor: "Juggernaut besitzt die Macht von Cyttorak, die ihn aber auch in den Wahnsinn treibt."
name: Juggernauts Zerstörungswut
text: Sobald aufgedeckt: Lege jede Zäh-Statuskarte von jedem befreundeten Charakter ab. Platziere hier 2 Bedrohung für jede auf diese Weise abgelegte Zäh-Statuskarte.

name: Unaufhaltsam
text: Hänge diese Karte an den Gegner mit dem höchsten aufgedruckten ANG-Wert und ohne ein angehängtes Exemplar Unaufhaltsam an. Ansonsten erhält diese Karte Nachrüsten. Erzwungene Unterbrechung: Sobald der Gegner mit diesem Anhang angreift, erhält der Angriff Overkill und Durchdringend. Lege Unaufhaltsam am Ende des Angriffs ab.

flavor: "Weißt du nicht, wer ich bin?" - Juggernaut
name: Reingehauen
text:
Sobald aufgedeckt: Du wirst betäubt. Falls du bereits betäubt bist, nimm 2 Schaden.
[star] Boost: Decke diese Karte auf.

name: Dauerhaft Phasenverschoben
text: Gib dies dem Spieler von Kitty Pryde. Drehe dein Massegestalt-Upgrade auf die Phasenform-Seite um. Du kannst nicht angreifen, verteidigen oder deine Massegestalt wechseln. Alter Ego - Aktion: Erschöpfe Kitty Pryde → entferne Dauerhaft phasenverschoben aus dem Spiel.

name: White Queen
text:
Schurkisch. Solange White Queen mit dir im Kampf ist, bist du verwirrt. (Shadowcats Erzfeind-Scherge.)
[star] Boost: Du wirst verwirrt.

name: Der Hellfire Club
text: Sobald besiegt: Der Spieler, der diesen Plan besiegt hat, durchsucht das Begegnungsdeck, den Ablagestapel und die beiseitegelegten Karten nach einem Schergen Hellfire-Schachfigur und bringt ihn mit sich im Kampf ins Spiel. (Mische.)

name: Hellfire-Schachfigur
text:
Nachrüsten. Patrouille. Wache.
[star] Boost: Bringe Hellfire-Schachfigur mit dir im Kampf ins Spiel.

flavor: "Sei ein Schatz und beweg dich nicht ... und schweig. So ist es besser." - White Queen
name: Telepathische Fesselung
text: Hänge diese Karte an deine Identität an. Solange Telepathische Fesselung an deine Identität angehängt ist, bist du betäubt. Aktion: Gib [mental][mental]-Ressourcen aus → lege diese Karte ab.

flavor: "I'll rip yer guts out!"
name: Sabretooth I
text: [star] Forced Response: After Sabretooth activates against you, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Heal damage from Sabretooth equal to the number of boost icons ([boost]) discarded this way.

name: Sabretooth II
text: Toughness.

name: Sabretooth III
text: Retaliate 1. Toughness.

name: Stalked by Sabretooth 1A
text: Contents: Sabretooth (I) and Sabretooth (II). (Sabretooth (II) and Sabretooth (III) for expert mode.) Sabretooth and Standard sets. Two modular sets (Brotherhood and Mystique). Setup: Put the Find the Senator side scheme into play. Attach the Robert Kelly to it. While attached to Find the Senator, Robert Kelly is in play but under no player's control.

name: Stalked by Sabretooth 1B
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, deal 2 damage to Robert Kelly (3 damage instead if there is at least 6[per_hero] threat here). While Robert Kelly is attached to Find the Senator, treat his text box as if it were blank. If Robert Kelly leaves play, the players lose the game.

flavor: Sabretooth has wounded Senator Kelly and continues to hound him!
name: The Injured Senator 2A
text: When Revealed: Deal each player a facedown encounter card.

flavor: Get Robert Kelly to safety before Sabretooth finishes the job.
name: The Injured Senator 2B
text: When Completed: Defeat Robert Kelly. If Robert Kelly leaves play, the players lose the game.

name: Find the Senator
text: Robert Kelly cannot be healed by player card effects and cannot have upgrades attached. When Defeated: The first player detaches Robert Kelly from this scheme and takes control of him. Advance to main scheme 2A. Flip this card and place it next the main scheme.

name: Protect the Senator
text: Robert Kelly cannot be healed by player card effects and cannot have upgrades attached. Hero Response: After your hero defends against an attack from Sabretooth, spend 2 resources of any type → ready your hero. Only the player who controls Robert Kelly can trigger this ability.

name: Robert Kelly
text: The first player controls Robert Kelly. He does not count against your ally limit and cannot have player cards attached. Forced Interrupt: When an enemy resolves an undefended attack against you, deal the damage to Robert Kelly.

name: Adamantium Claws
text:
Attach to Sabretooth. [star] Sabretooth's attacks gain piercing. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Attach this card to Sabretooth.

name: Animal Ferocity
text:
Attach to Sabretooth. Sabretooth gains stalwart. (This character cannot be stunned or confused.) Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Attach this card to Sabretooth.

name: Sabretooth Strikes
text:
When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to Robert Kelly. You may exhaust your hero to prevent this.
[star] Boost: If this attack defeats an ally, place 2 threat on the main scheme.

name: Unreleting Savage
text: When Revealed (Alter_Ego): Sabretooth schemes. If he has no sustained damage, he gets +1 SCH for this activation. When Revealed (Hero): Sabretooth attacks you. If he has no sustained damage, he gets +1 ATK for this activation.

name: Medical Emergency
text:
Hinder 2[per_player].
Victory 1.

flavor: Sabretooth has worked himself into a frenzy in his hunt for Kelly. You need to draw his attention away from the Senator!
name: Deral Rage
text: When Defeated: Sabretooth attacks the player who defeated this scheme (even if that player is in alter-ego form).

name: Avalanche
text:
[star] Forced Response: After Avalanche attacks you, exhaust a character you control.
[star] Boost: Exhaust a character you control.

flavor: Nothing moves the Blob!
name: Blob
text: Guard.

flavor: I always play with fire. And I never get burned!
name: Pyro
text: [star] Forced Response: After Pyro attacks you, discard the top 2 cards of your deck. Take 1 indirect damage for each printed resource icon discarded this way.

name: Toad
text:
[star] Forced Response: After Toad attacks and damages a character you control, discard 1 random card from your hand.
[star] Boost: Discard 1 random card from your hand.

name: Homo Superior
text:
Attach to a minion and give it a tough status card. Otherwise, this card gains surge. Attached minion gets +5 hit points.
[star] Boost: Attach this card to a minion and give it a tough status card.

name: Mutant Terrorists
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for The Brotherhood side scheme and reveal it. (Shuffle.) If it did not enter play this way, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Brotherhood of Mutants]] minion is discarded and reveal it.

flavor: Magneto assembled the Brotherhood of Mutants to enact his plan for mutant dominance.
name: The Brotherhood
text: Hinder 2[per_player].

flavor: I am not a woman to be trifled with!
name: Mystique
text: Toughness.

flavor: Mystique's shapeshifting makes her all manner of trouble.
name: Metamorphic Mayhem
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme shuffles each [[Shapeshifter]] card from the encounter discard pile into their deck.

name: Infiltration
text: When Revealed: Shuffle this card into your deck. This card gains surge. Forced Response: After this card enters your hand, discard an ally or support you control. (You may discard this card from your hand at the end of the player phase like any other card.)

name: Shapeshifter Surprise
text: When Revealed: Shuffle this card into your deck. This card gains surge. Forced Response: After this card enters your hand, Mystique activates against you. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Mystique an reveal her.

name: Sentinel I
text: Toughness.

name: Sentinel II
text: Steady. Toughness.

name: Sentinel III
text: Stalwart. Toughness.

name: Night of the Sentinels A
text: Contents: Sentinel (I) and Sentinel (II). (Sentinel (II) and Sentinel (III) for expert mode.) Project Wideawake, Zero Tolerance, and Standard sets. One modular set (Sentinels). Setup: Set each [[Captive]] ally aside. Reveal the Operation Zero Tolerance and Mutants at the Mall side schemes.

name: Night of the Sentinels B
text: Operation Zero Tolerance gains permanent. Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is at least 5[per_hero] threat here, the first player places the top card of their deck facedown under Operation Zero Tolerance. Then, remove 5[per_hero] threat from this scheme.

name: Mutant at the Mall
text: When Defeated: The first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Sentinel]] minion and reveals it. Flip this card and put Jubilee into play, discarding any other version of Jubilee from play.

name: Jubilee
text: Victory -1. The first player controls Jubilee. She does not count against your ally limit. Action: Exhaust Jubilee and spend a [energy] resource → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "Man...have you got one weird life ahead of you."
name: Rictor
text: [star] Response: After Rictor attacks, deal 1 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with you.

name: Boom Boom
text: [star] Response: After Boom Boom attacks an enemy, place 1 bomb counter on it. At the end of the player phase, remove all bomb counters from play and deal 2 damage to each enemy for each bomb counter removed from it this way.

flavor: "Ah'm pretty much invulnerable when Ah'm blastin'."
name: Cannonball
text: [star] Cannonball takes -1 consequential damage after he attacks and defeats a minion.

flavor: "I dinna ken why ye're doin' this. But if'n ye hurt my friends, then yuir in fer a world o' hurt!"
name: Wolfsbane
text: [star] Wolfbane's attacks gain piercing.

name: Sentinel Mark IV
text: Guard. Patrol.

name: Gauntlet Beam
text:
Attach to the villain.
[star] The villain's attacks gain piercing and ranged.

name: Learning A.I.
text:
Attach to the villain.
[star] The villain gains retaliate 1.

name: Adaptive Armor
text:
Attach to the villain.
[star] The villain gets +8 hit points.

name: Self-Repair
text:
When Revealed: Discard each status card from the villain. Give the villain a tough status card and heal 5 damage from it.
[star] Boost: Give the villain a tough status card.

name: Mutant Detected
text: When Revealed: Choose: • Place the top card of your deck facedown under Operation Zero Tolerance. • The villain and each minion engaged with you attacks you (even if you are in alter-ego form).

flavor: "If we don't get to our friends first, they'll be captured for sure!" —Iceman
name: Warn the Others
text: Forced Response: After your turn ends, place this card facedown under Operation Zero Tolerance. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust your identity → discard this card.

name: Abduction Protocols
text: Hinder 2[per_player]. Victory 2.

name: Sentinel Mark II
text: When Revealed: If Operation Zero Tolerance is in play, Sentinel Mark II gains surge. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Operation Zero Tolerance side scheme and reveal it. (Shuffle.)

name: Sentinel Mark III
text: Toughness.

name: Energy Barrier
text: Attach to a [[Sentinel]] minion without Energy Barrier attached and give it a tough status card. Otherwise, this card gains surge. [star] Forced Response: After attached minion attacks, give it a tough status card.

name: Operation Zero Tolerance
text: Forced Response: After an enemy attacks and defeats an ally, place that ally facedown under this scheme. If there are X facedown cards under this scheme, the players lose the game. X is 3 more than the number of players.

name: Sentinel Mark V
text: When Revealed: If Targeted for Elimination is attached to your identity, Sentinel Mark V attacks you (even if you are in alter-ego form). Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Targeted for Elimination attachment and reveal it.

name: Sentinel Mark VI
text: Quickstrike.

name: Targeted for Elimination
text: Attach to your identity if a copy of Targeted for Elimination is not attached to you. Otherwise, this card gains surge. While you are engaged with a [[Sentinel]] minion, you cannot change from hero form to alter-ego form. Action: Exhaust your identity → discard this card.

flavor: Sentinels were constructed solely for hunting mutants. They do not tire. They do not stop until they capture their target.
name: Relentless Robots
text: Each player engaged with a [[Sentinel]] minion cannot thwart this scheme.

name: Master Mold I
text: Stalwart. Toughness.

name: Master Mold II
text: Stalwart. Toughness.

name: Master Mold III
text: Stalwart. Toughness.

name: The Sentinel Factory A
text: Contents: Master Mold (I) and Master Mold (II). (Master Mold (II) and Master Mold (III) for expert mode.) Master Mold, Sentinels, and Standard sets. One modular set (Zero Tolerance). Setup: Put the Magneto Ally (172B) into play under the first player's control.

name: The Sentinel Factory B
text: Each [[Sentinel]] minion gains guard. When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the encounter deck until they discard a [[Sentinel]] minion, then puts it into play engaged with them.

name: Master Mold's Agenda A
text: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Each player discards cards from the encounter deck until they discard a [[Sentinel]] minion, then puts it into play engaged with them.

flavor: Master Mold's programming has backfired! Recognizing that mutants come from humans, the giant Sentinel is programming its 'offspring' to subdue everyone on Earth!
name: Master Mold's Agenda B
text: Each [[Sentinel]] minion gains guard. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: "They've upgraded their armor!" —Cyclops
name: Sentinel Mark VIII
text: Forced Response: After this minion engages you, attach the topmost [[Sentinel]] attachment from the discard pile to this minion.

name: Unit Upgrade
text:
Attach to a [[Sentinel]] minion. Otherwise, this card gains surge. Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains retaliate 1.
[star] Boost: Attach to a [[Sentinel]] minion.

name: Stun Beam
text: Attach to a [[Sentinel]] minion without Stun Beam attached. Otherwise, this card gains surge. [star] Forced Response: After attached minion attacks and damages a character, stun that character.

name: Master Mold's Children
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Each minion engaged with you schemes. If you are not engaged with a minion, Master Mold schemes. When Revealed (Hero): Each minion engaged with you attacks you. If you are not engaged with a minion, Master Mold attacks you.

name: Shields Up
text:
When Revealed: Give each [[Sentinel]] minion engaged with you a tough status card. Otherwise, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: Give the villain a tough status card.

name: Intruder Alert!
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards cards from the encounter deck until they discard a [[Sentinel]] minion, then puts it into play engaged with them.

flavor: If you can insert a computer virus into Master Mold's mainframe, you can weaken it from the inside.
name: Insert Virus Program
text: Hinder 2[per_player]. Victory 1.

flavor: "Come out and fight, or I'll bring the whole building down!"
name: Avalanche A
text: Toughness. Victory 2.

flavor: "Come out and fight, or I'll bring the whole building down!"
name: Avalanche B
text: Toughness. Victory 2.

flavor: "First I'm going to crush you! Then I'm going to raid your fridge!"
name: Blob A
text: Toughness. Victory 2.

flavor: "First I'm going to crush you! Then I'm going to raid your fridge!"
name: Blob B
text: Toughness. Victory 2.

name: Pyro A
text: Toughness. Victory 2.

name: Pyro B
text: Toughness. Victory 2.

flavor: "You X-Men think you're so much better than me! I'll show you!"
name: Toad A
text: Toughness. Victory 2.

flavor: "You X-Men think you're so much better than me! I'll show you!"
name: Toad B
text: Toughness. Victory 2.

name: The Brotherhood Strikes! A
text: Contents: Avalanche (A), Blob (A), Pyro (A), and Toad (A). (Use their (B) sides for expert mode.) Mansion Attack, Brotherhood, and Standard sets. One modular set (Mystique). Setup: Put the Save the School environment into play. Shuffle all copies of main scheme 2A and stack them under this scheme. Shuffle the villains together (without looking) to create the villain deck. The top card of this deck is in play.

flavor: The Xavier Institute is under attack by the Brotherhood of Mutants!
name: The Brotherhood Strikes! B
text: When Revealed: Deal each player a facedown encounter card. Advance to the next card in the main scheme deck. Add this card to the victory display.

flavor: The Brotherhood strike in unison, focusing their attack on...
name: The Atrium A
text: When Revealed: Flip this card.

name: The Atrium B
text: Each character gains steady. When Completed: Add this scheme to the victory display. Advance to the next card in the main scheme deck. If there are 3 main schemes in the victory display, the players lose the game.

flavor: The Brotherhood strike in unison, focusing their attack on...
name: The Cafeteria A
text: When Revealed: Flip this card.

name: The Cafeteria B
text: Each character gains retaliate 1. When Completed: Add this scheme to the victory display. Advance to the next card in the main scheme deck. If there are 3 main schemes in the victory display, the players lose the game.

flavor: The Brotherhood strike in unison, focusing their attack on...
name: The Basketball Court A
text: When Revealed: Flip this card.

name: The Basketball Court B
text: Each ally and minion gains toughness. When Completed: Add this scheme to the victory display. Advance to the next card in the main scheme deck. If there are 3 main schemes in the victory display, the players lose the game.

flavor: The Brotherhood strike in unison, focusing their attack on...
name: The Courtyard A
text: When Revealed: Flip this card.

name: The Courtyard B
text: Each character gains +1 ATK. When Completed: Add this scheme to the victory display. Advance to the next card in the main scheme deck. If there are 3 main schemes in the victory display, the players lose the game.

name: Save the School
text: Forced Response: After the villain is defeated, if there are X villains in the victory display, the players win the game. (See rulebook, page 15.) Otherwise, deal each player an encounter card and reveal the next villain. If a minion with the same title as the new villain is engaged with a player, discard that minion and the villain activates against that player.

name: Brotherhood Beatdown
text: When Revealed: For each of the following enemies in play: - Avalanche, exhaust your identity. - Blob, you are stunned. - Pyro, take 2 indirect damage. - Toad, discard 1 random card from your hand.

name: Ground Swell
text:
When Revealed: Avalanche activates against you. If he is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Avalanche minion and reveal him.
[star] Boost: If the villain is Avalanche, give him an additional boost card for this activation.

name: Immovable
text:
When Revealed: Blob activates against you. If he is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Blob minion and reveal him.
[star] Boost: If the villain is Blob, give him an additional boost card for this activation.

name: Pyromaniac
text:
When Revealed: Pyro activates against you. If he is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Pyro minion and reveal him.
[star] Boost: If the villain is Pyro, give him an additional boost card for this activation.

name: Hopping Mad
text: Hinder 2[per_player].

name: Protect the Students
text: Hinder 2[per_hero]. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme searches their deck and discard pile for an ally and adds it to their hand.

name: Under Siege
text: When Revealed: Place 3 threat on this scheme for each [[Brotherhood of Mutants]] character in play.

flavor: "To oppose the Master of Magnetism is to invite your own destruction!"
name: Magneto I
text: Steady. Toughness.

name: Magneto II
text: Steady. Toughness.

name: Magneto III
text: Steady. Toughness.

flavor: Magneto floats above the Earth in his orbital sanctuary.
name: Asteroid M A
text: Contents: Magneto (I) and Magneto (II). (Magneto (II) and Magneto (III) for expert mode.) Magneto and Standard sets. One modular set (Acolytes). Setup: Set the Orbital Decay side scheme aside. Reveal the Boarding Party side scheme.

name: Asteroid M B
text: Forced Response: After you place a magnet counter on this scheme, if there are at least 3 magnet counters here, discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[Magnetic]] card is discarded. Reveal that card, then remove 3 magnet counters from this scheme.

name: Factory Online A
text: When Revealed: Place 1 magnet counter here. If Sabotage Master Mold is not in the victory display, the first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of the M-Type Sentinel minion and reveals it.

name: Factory Online B
text: Forced Response: After you place a magnet counter on this scheme, if there are at least 3 magnet counters here, discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[Magnetic]] card is discarded. Reveal that card, then remove 3 magnet counters from this scheme.

name: The Rule of Magnus A
text: When Revealed: Place 2 magnet counters here. If Physical Strain is not attached to Magneto, the first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Magnetic]] attachment and reveals it.

name: The Rule of Magnus B
text: Forced Response: After you place a magnet counter on this scheme, if there are at least 3 magnet counters here, discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[Magnetic]] card is discarded. Reveal that card, then remove 3 magnet counters from this scheme. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: To stop Magneto's nefarious plan, you must first board Asteroid M.
name: Boarding Party
text: Magneto cannot have more than 6[per_hero] sustained damage. When Defeated: Flip this card and reveal Sabotage Master Mold.

flavor: Master Mold has been reprogrammed. You must take it offline before it can create human-hunting Sentinels!
name: Sabotage Master Mold
text: Magneto cannot have more than 12[per_hero] sustained damage. When Defeated: Reveal the set-aside Orbital Decay side scheme. Add this card to the victory display.

flavor: Magneto is an indomitable foe. The only way to ensure his defeat is to destroy his asteroid bas by crashing it to Earth.
name: Orbital Decay
text: Magneto cannot have more than 18[per_hero] sustained damage. When Defeated: Flip this card and reveal Physical Strain.

flavor: As Asteroid M begins its uncontrolled plummet, Magneto uses his power to hold it together even as he fights with you!.
name: Physical Strain
text:
Attach to Magneto.
Permanent.
Magneto loses steady.

name: M-Type Sentinel
text: Guard.

flavor: Magneto designed his helmet to protect him from Xavier's telepathic powers.
name: Magneto's Helmet
text:
Attach to Magneto.
Magneto cannot be confused.

flavor: Magneto's armor is strong enough to survive a direct blast from a Sentinel's gauntlet beam.
name: Magneto's Armor
text:
Attach to Magneto.
Magneto cannot be stunned.

name: Magnetic Bubble
text:
Attach to Magneto.
Magneto gains retaliate 1.

flavor: "Well, this sucks." —Archangel
name: Wrapped in Metal
text: Attach to your identity. Max 1 per identity. Attached identity cannot thwart, attack, defend, or recover. Action: Exhaust your identity and spend a [physical] resource → discard this card.

flavor: "Neither your powers nor all your skills can save you from my wrath!" —Magneto
name: Master of Magnetism
text: When Revealed: Take the topmost [[Magnetic]] card in the encounter discard pile and give it to Magneto as a facedown boost card. Magneto activates against you.

name: Electric Shock
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): You are confused. Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each magnet counter on it. When Revealed (Hero): You are stunned. Take 1 damage for each magnet counter on the main scheme.

name: Electromagnetic Blast
text:
When Revealed: Exhaust each upgrade and support you control. Place 1 counter on the main scheme.
[star] Boost: Exhaust your identity.

name: Metal Shards
text:
When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character you control. Place 1 magnet counter on the main scheme.
[star] Boost: If this is an attack that defeats an ally, place 1 magnet counter on the main scheme.

flavor: "I should have seen that coming!" —Cyclops
name: Magnetic Missile
text: Surge.

name: Magnetic Mayhem
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards the top 4 cards of the encounter deck. That player places 1 magnet counter on the main scheme for each [[Magnetic]] card discarded this way.

name: Magnetically Sealed
text:
When Revealed: Place 2 additional threat here for each ally in play.
[star] Boost: Exhaust each ally you control.

name: Seized!
text: When Revealed: Each player places the top 6 cards of their deck facedown under here. When Defeated: Magneto activates against the player who defeated this scheme. (Discard cards under here.)

name: Fabian Cortez
text: Teamwork ([[ACOLYTE]]). Villainous.

name: Amelia Voght
text: Stalwart. Teamwork ([[ACOLYTE]]).

name: Senyaka
text: Teamwork ([[ACOLYTE]]).

name: Delgado
text: Retaliate 1. Teamwork ([[ACOLYTE]]).

name: Unuscione
text: Teamwork ([[ACOLYTE]]). Toughness.

name: Zeal for the Cause
text: When Revealed: Resolve the "When Defeated" ability of each [[Acolyte]] minion engaged with you. If you are not engaged with an [[Acolyte]] minion, discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded, then reveal it.

name: The Acolytes
text:
Each [[Acolyte]] minion gains guard.
[star] Boost: Shuffle each [[Acolyte]] minion from the discard pile into the encounter deck.

flavor: "I have returned."
name: Nimrod
text: Stalwart. Victory 1.

flavor: "To ensure the future of humanity, I will destroy mutantkind."
name: Bastion
text: Toughness. Villainous. Victory 1.

name: Nimrod's Portal
text: Victory 1.

flavor: Bastion manipulates current events to bring about the future from which he came.
name: Bastion's Machinations
text: Victory 1.

name: Nano-Sentinel Tech
text: Victory 1.
